events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your software development experience.
A recruiter experienced in engineering hiring has been assigned to guide you through the process.
We completed the initial screening call with you and found your background in software development very promising.
Thank you for promptly responding with your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC to discuss your coding skills.
The technical interview went well, and the feedback highlights your strong problem-solving and coding abilities.
An HR interview has been arranged for you on May 13th to discuss culture fit and company benefits.
You completed the HR interview, sharing your expectations and enthusiasm for the role and company culture.
We have extended an official job offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team soon.
Congratulations! You have officially accepted our offer and will start onboarding shortly.
Your onboarding process is underway, including orientation sessions and setup for your engineering projects.
The hiring process is now complete, and we are excited to welcome you as a valued Software Engineer on our team.
